name: Explosive Burpees
instructions: Perform a standard burpee, but explode into a high tuck jump at the top.

name: Plyometric Lunges
instructions: Start in a lunge position and explosively jump, switching your front and back legs in mid-air.

name: Broad Jump to Bear Crawl
instructions: Perform a maximal broad jump forward, then immediately drop into a bear crawl and crawl backwards to the start.

name: 180 Degree Squat Jumps
instructions: Drop into a squat and jump explosively, rotating 180 degrees in the air. Land softly and immediately squat and jump back.

name: Plank-to-Pike Jumps
instructions: From a high plank, jump your feet forward towards your hands into a pike position, then jump back to plank.

name: Breakdancer Planks
instructions: From a plank, kick one leg through and across your body, rotating your hips and touching your opposite hand.

name: Mountain Climber Burpees
instructions: Perform a burpee, but at the bottom in the plank position, perform 4 quick mountain climbers before jumping up.

name: Tuck Jump Push-ups
instructions: Perform a push-up, then jump your feet in and explode into a high tuck jump.

name: Skater Hops
instructions: Bound from side to side, landing on one foot and sweeping the other leg behind you for balance. Stay low and explosive.

name: Fast Feet Sprints
instructions: Stay on the balls of your feet and move them as quickly as possible in place, like a football drill.

name: Donkey Kicks
instructions: From a crouched position, kick both feet up into the air explosively, trying to get your hips over your shoulders.

name: Heisman Shuffles
instructions: Shuffle two steps to one side and bring your inside knee up high, then repeat on the other side. Stay quick and agile.

name: Sprawl to Sprawl
instructions: From standing, quickly drop your hips and kick your legs back into a plank (a sprawl), then immediately jump back up.

name: Power Skips
instructions: Perform high skips, focusing on driving your knee up and getting as much height as possible with each skip.

name: Lateral High Knees
instructions: Perform high knees while moving laterally for 3-4 steps, then switch direction.

name: Inchworm Push-ups
instructions: From standing, walk your hands out to a plank, perform a push-up, then walk your feet in towards your hands and stand up.

name: Pike Push-ups
instructions: From a downward dog position, lower your head towards the floor by bending your elbows, keeping your hips high.

name: Diamond Push-up Burpees
instructions: Perform a burpee, but use a diamond hand position for the push-up to target your triceps.

name: Crab Toe Touches
instructions: In a crab walk position, lift one hand and the opposite foot simultaneously and touch them in the middle.

name: Star Jumps
instructions: From a crouch, explode upwards, extending your arms and legs out into a star shape in mid-air.

name: Bench Burpees
instructions: Place hands on the bench, jump feet back to plank, perform a push-up on the bench, jump feet in and jump up.

name: Bench Jump Overs
instructions: Stand to one side of the bench, place hands on it, and jump with both feet over to the other side. Move continuously.

name: Decline Push-ups
instructions: Place your feet on the bench and hands on the floor. Perform push-ups to target your upper chest and shoulders.

name: Incline Mountain Climbers
instructions: Place your hands on the bench and your feet on the floor. Drive your knees towards your chest as fast as possible.

name: Bench Step-ups with Knee Drive
instructions: Step one foot onto the bench and drive the opposite knee up high explosively. Alternate legs.

name: Single Leg Bench Squats (Pistol Squat Assist)
instructions: Stand on one leg facing away from the bench. Squat down until your glutes tap the bench, then drive back up.

name: Bench Pike Push-ups
instructions: Place your feet on the bench and walk your hands in, keeping hips high in a pike. Lower your head towards the floor.

name: Bench Dips
instructions: Place hands on the edge of the bench, fingers forward. Lower your body down until your elbows are at 90 degrees.

name: Lateral Bench Jumps
instructions: Stand beside the bench and jump laterally onto the bench and then down to the other side. Repeat back and forth.

name: Bench Bulgarian Split Squats
instructions: Place the top of one foot on the bench behind you. Lunge down on your front leg until your thigh is parallel to the floor.

name: Bench Single-Leg Hip Thrusts
instructions: Lie with your upper back on the bench, one foot on the floor and the other leg extended. Drive your hips up towards the ceiling.

name: Bench Plank Up-Downs
instructions: Start in a plank with your forearms on the bench. Push up one hand at a time to a high plank, then lower back down.

name: Bench Bear Crawls
instructions: Place hands on the bench and crawl your feet up towards it, then crawl back down to a plank. Maintain a flat back.

name: Bench Jump Squats
instructions: Stand in front of the bench, squat down and tap the bench with your glutes, then explode up into a high jump.

name: Bench Reverse Lunges
instructions: Stand on the bench. Step one foot back and down into a lunge, tapping the floor, then drive back up to standing on the bench.

name: Incline Push-up to T-Rotation
instructions: Perform a push-up with hands on the bench, then at the top, rotate your body and extend one arm to the ceiling.

name: Decline Mountain Climber Twists
instructions: With feet on the bench, perform mountain climbers, but bring your knee towards the opposite elbow.

name: Bench Box Jumps
instructions: Stand facing the bench and perform a box jump, landing softly on top. Step or jump down safely.

name: Bench Tricep Dip to Knee Tuck
instructions: Perform a bench dip, and as you push up, bring both knees into your chest for a tuck.

name: Elevated Side Plank Hip Dips
instructions: Place your top foot on the bench in a side plank position. Dip your bottom hip towards the floor and raise it back up.

name: Bench Supported Jump Lunges
instructions: Place one hand on the bench for balance and perform explosive plyometric lunges, switching legs mid-air.

name: Decline Plank Jacks
instructions: With your feet on the bench in a plank, jump your feet apart and back together like a horizontal jumping jack.

name: Bench Lateral Step-Over
instructions: Stand beside the bench, step up laterally with your inside foot, bring the other foot to tap, and step down on the other side.

name: Incline Burpee
instructions: A variation of the bench burpee; jump feet back, then jump feet wide outside the bench, and jump up.

name: Bench Supported Single Leg Deadlifts
instructions: Stand on one leg, holding the bench with one hand for support. Hinge at the hips, keeping your back straight.

name: Decline Spider-Man Push-ups
instructions: With feet on the bench, perform a push-up while bringing one knee to the outside of your elbow.

name: Bench Plank to Squat Jump
instructions: Start in a plank with hands on the bench. Jump your feet in towards the bench and explode into a squat jump.

name: Bench Supported Calf Raise Jumps
instructions: Stand on the bench with heels off the edge. Perform a calf raise then immediately jump up for height.

name: Bench Reverse Plank Pulses
instructions: Sit on the floor with hands on the bench behind you. Lift hips into a reverse plank and perform small pulses.

name: Decline Burpees
instructions: Start with feet on the bench. Jump down, perform a push-up on the floor, then jump feet back onto the bench.

name: Bench Jump Squats with Rotation
instructions: Perform a bench jump squat, but add a 90-degree rotation in the air. Alternate direction.

name: Elevated Push-up to Knee Tuck
instructions: With hands on the bench, do a push-up. At the top, jump both knees in towards your chest, then back to plank.

name: Bench Lateral Bounds
instructions: Stand on the bench. Jump laterally off to one side, landing softly, then immediately jump back on and to the other side.

name: Incline Pike Walks
instructions: With feet on the floor and hands on the bench, walk your feet in as close as possible to a handstand position, then walk back out.

name: Decline Bear Crawls
instructions: With feet on the bench and hands on the floor, crawl side to side, keeping your knees bent and close to the ground.

name: Bench Crawl-Unders
instructions: Crawl or roll under the bench from one side to the other, then pop up and jump over the bench to return to the start.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press Burpee
instructions: Holding dumbbells, perform a chest press on the bench. At the top, jump feet to the floor, do a renegade row, then jump back up.

name: Incline Dumbbell Thrusters
instructions: Sit on an inclined bench holding dumbbells at your shoulders. Press them overhead as you stand up explosively.

name: Single-Arm Bench Row to Stand
instructions: Place one knee and hand on the bench. Perform a single-arm row, then stand up explosively. Alternate sides.

name: Dumbbell Bench Step-ups
instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides or on your shoulders. Step up onto the bench, driving through your heel.

name: Dumbbell Bench Chest Fly to Tuck Jump
instructions: Perform a dumbbell chest fly on the bench. As you bring the weights together, sit up, drop the weights, and do a tuck jump.

name: Dumbbell Bench Pullover to Crunch
instructions: Lie on the bench holding one dumbbell with both hands. Lower it behind your head, then pull it over your chest as you crunch up.

name: Alternating Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on the bench with two dumbbells. Press one up as you lower the other, maintaining a rapid, alternating pace.

name: Bench Dumbbell Renegade Rows
instructions: Place dumbbells on the bench. Get into a plank with hands on the dumbbells and perform alternating rows.

name: Decline Dumbbell Chest Press
instructions: Lie on a decline bench. Press the dumbbells up from your chest until your arms are fully extended.

name: Dumbbell Bench Jump Overs
instructions: Place a dumbbell on the floor. Stand beside the bench, jump over it, pick up the dumbbell, and jump back over.

name: Incline Dumbbell Plank Rows
instructions: With feet on the floor and one hand on an incline bench, row a dumbbell with the other arm. Keep your core tight.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press to Leg Raise
instructions: Perform a dumbbell bench press. At the top of the press, perform a leg raise, keeping your lower back on the bench.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bicep Curls
instructions: Sit on an incline bench and let your arms hang down. Curl the dumbbells up, squeezing your biceps.

name: Dumbbell Bench Bulgarian Lunges
instructions: Hold dumbbells and place one foot on the bench behind you. Perform a lunge on your front leg.

name: Incline Dumbbell Burpees
instructions: Holding dumbbells, place them on an incline bench, jump back to plank, jump in, then stand and press the dumbbells overhead.

name: Decline Dumbbell Push-ups
instructions: Place your feet on the bench and hands on dumbbells on the floor. Perform a push-up for an increased range of motion.

name: Dumbbell Bench Lateral Step-ups
instructions: Hold a dumbbell on one shoulder. Step up laterally onto the bench with your inside leg.

name: Flat Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench and press the dumbbells from your chest upwards until your arms are fully extended.

name: Incline Dumbbell Chest Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench and press the dumbbells from your upper chest upwards until your arms are fully extended.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on the bench and press one dumbbell at a time, forcing your core to stabilize your body.

name: Plate Bench Press Burpee
instructions: Hold a plate with both hands and perform a chest press on the bench. Jump off, place the plate down, do a burpee over it.

name: Bench Plate Russian Twists
instructions: Sit on the bench, lean back, and lift your feet. Twist your torso from side to side, tapping the plate on the bench.

name: Incline Plate Push-ups
instructions: Place hands on the edge of a weight plate on an incline bench. Perform push-ups with this unstable grip.

name: Decline Plate Mountain Climbers
instructions: With feet on the bench and hands on a plate on the floor, perform fast mountain climbers.

name: Plate Bench Chest Press to Jump
instructions: Perform a chest press with a plate on the bench, sit up, stand, and perform a squat jump while holding the plate.

name: Plate Bench Step-ups
instructions: Hold a weight plate at your chest and step up onto the bench. Alternate leading legs.

name: Bench Plate Halos
instructions: Sit on the bench and circle a weight plate around your head, engaging your core and shoulders.

name: Bench Plate Slams
instructions: Stand on the bench holding a plate overhead. Jump off, slam the plate on the ground, and jump back on the bench.

name: Kettlebell Bench Pistol Squats
instructions: Hold a kettlebell at your chest (goblet style) and perform a single leg squat, tapping the bench at the bottom.

name: Kettlebell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on the bench and press two kettlebells up, focusing on stabilizing the offset weight.

name: Kettlebell Bench Step-up to Press
instructions: Hold a kettlebell in one hand. Step onto the bench and press the kettlebell overhead at the top.

name: Kettlebell Bench Dip to Swing
instructions: Perform a bench dip. At the top, stand up, grab a kettlebell and perform one explosive swing.

name: Single Arm Kettlebell Bench Row
instructions: Place one knee and hand on the bench for support and row a heavy kettlebell to your side.

name: Kettlebell Bulgarian Split Squat Pass-Through
instructions: Get into a Bulgarian split squat position. Pass a kettlebell under your front leg from hand to hand.

name: Kettlebell Bench Pullovers
instructions: Lie with your upper back across the bench, holding a kettlebell by the horns. Lower it behind your head, then pull it back over.

name: Kettlebell Bench Burpee Press
instructions: Perform a burpee with hands on the bench. At the top, grab two kettlebells and press them overhead.

name: Medicine Ball Bench Slams
instructions: Stand on the bench, raise a medicine ball overhead, and slam it on the floor beside the bench.

name: Medicine Ball Decline Push-up
instructions: Place feet on the bench and one hand on a medicine ball. Perform a push-up, then roll the ball to the other hand.

name: Medicine Ball Bench V-Ups
instructions: Lie on the bench holding a medicine ball. Simultaneously lift your legs and torso, passing the ball to your feet.

name: Medicine Ball Bench Jump Squats
instructions: Hold a medicine ball at your chest. Squat to tap the bench, then explode up into a jump.

name: Medicine Ball Bench Burpee Toss
instructions: Perform a burpee facing a wall, with hands on the bench. At the top, grab a medicine ball and throw it against the wall.

name: Medicine Ball Bench Twists
instructions: Sit on the bench, lean back with feet up, and twist side to side, tapping the medicine ball on the bench.

name: Band-Resisted Bench Press
instructions: Loop a resistance band around your back and hold it in your hands. Perform a fast-paced bench press against the band's tension.

name: Band-Resisted Bench Hip Thrust
instructions: With upper back on the bench and a band around your thighs, drive your hips up, pushing your knees out against the band.

name: Band-Anchored Bench Sprints
instructions: Anchor a band to a low point behind the bench. Loop it around your waist and perform high-knee sprints in place.

name: Band-Resisted Incline Push-ups
instructions: Loop a band across your back and place hands on the bench. Perform explosive push-ups against the band's resistance.

name: Band-Resisted Bench Dips
instructions: Place a band across your lap and anchor it with your hands to add resistance to your bench dips.

name: Band Bench Pull-Aparts
instructions: Lie on the bench and hold a band with both hands over your chest. Pull the band apart, squeezing your shoulder blades.

name: Dumbbell Thrusters
instructions: Hold dumbbells at your shoulders. Squat down, and as you stand up, press the dumbbells explosively overhead.

name: Renegade Row Burpees
instructions: With hands on dumbbells, perform a burpee. At the plank, do a renegade row on each side before jumping up.

name: Man Makers
instructions: A complex movement: push-up on dumbbells, row each arm, jump feet in, squat clean, then press overhead.

name: Resistance Band Squat Jumps
instructions: Place a band around your thighs. Perform squat jumps, focusing on pushing your knees out against the band.

name: Resistance Band Pull-Aparts
instructions: Hold a band with both hands at shoulder height. Pull the band apart by squeezing your shoulder blades together.

name: Kettlebell Swings
instructions: Hinge at your hips and swing the kettlebell forward to chest height using the power from your glutes and hamstrings.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat to Press
instructions: Hold a kettlebell at your chest. Perform a deep goblet squat, and as you stand, press the kettlebell overhead.

name: Kettlebell Halos
instructions: Hold a kettlebell by the horns and circle it around your head, keeping your core tight and avoiding moving your head.

name: Medicine Ball Slams
instructions: Lift a medicine ball overhead, rise onto your toes, and use your entire body to slam the ball into the ground.

name: Medicine Ball Russian Twists
instructions: Sit on the floor with knees bent and feet elevated. Twist your torso, tapping the ball on the floor on each side.

name: Jump Rope High Knees
instructions: While jumping rope, bring your knees up to hip level with each rotation. Keep it fast and consistent.

name: Jump Rope Double Unders
instructions: Allow the rope to pass under your feet twice for every single jump. This requires an explosive jump and fast wrists.

name: Kipping Pull-ups
instructions: Use a hip-driven kip to generate momentum and pull your chin over the bar. Focus on a controlled, rhythmic motion.

name: Toes to Bar
instructions: Hang from the bar and use a combination of core strength and a kip to bring your toes up to touch the bar.

name: Resistance Loop Glute Bridges
instructions: Lie on your back with a loop around your thighs, just above your knees. Drive your hips up, pushing your knees apart.

name: Resistance Loop Lateral Walks
instructions: With a loop around your ankles or knees, take lateral steps in a squat position, keeping tension on the band.

name: Stability Ball Jackknife
instructions: Start in a plank with your shins on a stability ball. Pull your knees towards your chest, rolling the ball forward.

name: Stability Ball Hamstring Curls
instructions: Lie on your back with your heels on the ball. Lift your hips into a bridge and curl your heels towards your glutes.

name: Bosu Ball Burpees
instructions: Place the Bosu ball flat side down. Perform a burpee, using the dome for your push-up and jumping onto it at the top.

name: Bosu Ball Mountain Climbers
instructions: Hold the sides of the Bosu ball (flat side up) and perform mountain climbers, engaging your core to stabilize.

name: Suspension Trainer Atomic Push-ups
instructions: With feet in the straps, perform a push-up, then immediately bring both knees to your chest in a crunch.

name: Suspension Trainer Jump Squats
instructions: Hold the handles and lean back slightly. Perform a deep squat and use the straps for assistance to explode up into a jump.

name: Suspension Trainer Rows
instructions: Lean back holding the handles with arms extended. Pull your chest towards the handles, squeezing your back muscles.

name: Ankle Weight High Knees
instructions: With weights on, perform high knees, focusing on driving your knees up against the added resistance.

name: Ankle Weight Plank Jacks
instructions: In a high plank position with weights on, jump your feet apart and back together.

name: Weight Plate Halos
instructions: Stand holding a plate and circle it around your head. Keep your core tight and engaged.

name: Weight Plate Ground to Overhead
instructions: Squat down and pick up a plate. In one fluid motion, lift it off the ground and press it directly overhead.

name: Bench Step Plyo Jumps
instructions: Place one foot on a step or low bench, and explode up, switching feet in mid-air to land with the opposite foot on top.

name: Bench Step Burpee Box Jumps
instructions: Perform a burpee facing a step or bench, then immediately jump onto the box. Step down and repeat.

name: Battle Rope Alternating Waves
instructions: Hold one rope in each hand and alternate whipping your arms up and down to create waves.

name: Battle Rope Power Slams
instructions: Lift both ropes overhead simultaneously and slam them into the ground with maximum force.

name: Battle Rope Jumping Jacks
instructions: Perform jumping jacks while holding the battle ropes to add significant upper body resistance.

name: Slam Ball Burpees
instructions: Hold a slam ball, perform a burpee, and at the top, lift the ball overhead and slam it to the ground.

name: Slam Ball Rotational Throws
instructions: Stand perpendicular to a wall. Twist your torso and throw the slam ball forcefully against the wall.

name: Parallette T-Bar Push-ups
instructions: Arrange parallettes in a T-shape. Perform a push-up on one bar, then move to the other for the next rep.

name: Parallette L-Sit
instructions: Hold the bars and lift your straight legs up until they are parallel to the floor, forming an L-shape with your body.

name: Parallette Shoot-Throughs
instructions: From a support position on the bars, tuck your knees and 'shoot' your legs forward through your arms, then back again.

name: Ab Wheel Rollouts
instructions: From your knees, roll the wheel forward as far as you can while maintaining a straight line from knees to head, then roll back.

name: Standing Ab Wheel Rollouts
instructions: An advanced version of the rollout, performed from a standing position for a much greater range of motion.

name: Ab Wheel Oblique Rollouts
instructions: Perform a standard rollout, but angle your rollout to the left or right to target your obliques.

name: Mat Slams
instructions: Roll a yoga mat up tightly. Lift it overhead and slam it into the ground with force, like you would a slam ball.

name: Dynamic Mat Bridges
instructions: Lie on a mat with a resistance loop. Perform a glute bridge, and at the top, perform 3 quick pulses pushing your knees apart.

name: Bosu Ball Plank Up-Downs
instructions: With forearms on the Bosu dome, move from a forearm plank to a high plank one arm at a time.

name: Stability Ball Push-up to Pike
instructions: With shins on the ball, perform a push-up. Then, pull your hips up towards the ceiling into a pike position.

name: Kneeling to Standing Pull-ups
instructions: Start kneeling under the pull-up bar. Jump up to grab the bar and perform a pull-up in one fluid motion.

name: Slam Ball Thrusters
instructions: Hold a slam ball at your chest. Perform a deep squat, and as you stand, explosively press the ball overhead.
